thread.title: Gillian Salter

author: Gillian Salter
title: Gillian Salter
text: I recently ordered two blinds after a house move, for the utility and en-suite shower room. Although there are loads of companies selling blinds online, I chose Blinds 2go because they have such an excellent choice of fabrics, more so than their competitors. I'm very happy with the blinds and will certainly order more, in due course, from Blinds 2go.
